name: Freight Groove
description:
Play the desktop version for higher quality audio and reduced input latency!

Controls (can be changed in the options)

  • X to hit the drum center
  • C to hit the drum rim
  • Arrow keys to move
  • P to pause

Your overall progress is saved, though you will have to start a new run if you reload the game! If you are using private browsing the game won't work properly.

Credits

  • Small font: C&C Red Alert by N3tRunn3r
  • Large font: Derived from the small font by scaling and tweaking
  • Game engine: https://heaps.io/
  • Graphics: Aseprite, SpriteMancer, Blender
  • Music/SFX: Bitwig Studio, 40s Very Own - Keys, Analog Dreams 2.0, Braunschweig Piano 03, Chromatic Pan Flute, Guitar Rig 6, Microtonic Beatspace, psykic, Rave Generator 2, Redtron SE, Rough Rider, Session Strings 2, Studio Drummer, Synplant, Synth1, TAL Bitcrusher, Valhalla Supermassive, Vexengo SPAN, Vital, Youlean Loudness Meter 2
